channel.title: World Cup on An analysis of random things
channel.description: Recent content in World Cup on An analysis of random things

item.title: How Californians reacted to the Brazil vs. Germany game
item.description: Unless you’ve been livingÂ under a rock, there is no way you haven’t heard about the game between Brazil and Germany yesterday (7/8/14), and chances are you have also seen this twitter heat map video that went viral today. While watching it, I realized I have all the data to do such an analysis myself too (as I’ve been collecting tweets for another project). So I did. The caveat is that the tweets that I collected are only those originated from California (and thus my twist).
